body_html:
@wt-huang I was able to reproduce the bug on tf-nightly and python 3.6.
I have attached the 2 files which contain the minimal changes to reproduce the issue.
To summarize the changes, I have edited the function loss in cifar10_lrn.py to take an argument for input images and added an additional loss term which is the L2 norm of the gradients of the cross entropy with respect to the input images.
Could you please use the attached code to reproduce the issue at your end?

cifar10_lrn_bug.zip

@wt-huang I was able to reproduce the bug on tf-nightly and python 3.6.
I have attached the 2 files which contain the minimal changes to reproduce the issue. 
To summarize the changes, I have edited the function loss in cifar10_lrn.py to take an argument for input images and added an additional loss term which is the L2 norm of the gradients of the cross entropy with respect to the input images. 
Could you please use the attached code to reproduce the issue at your end?
